item.title: Markdown
item.description: H1 Heading H2 Heading H3 Heading Here’s some basic text. And here’s some italics Here’s some bold text. What about a link? Here’s a bulleted list: * First item + Second item - Third item Here’s a numbered list: 1. First 2. Second 3. Third A table: Tables Are Cool col 1 is left-aligned $1600 col 2 is centered $12 col 3 is right-aligned $1 Python code block:
